dcterms:description: The VHM dataset contains 1,426 virus-host interactions, which is only 37% of the known prokaryotic viruses in RefSeq. It is widely used for predicting hosts of prokaryotic viruses.
dcterms:title: VHM dataset

dcterms:description: The TEST dataset contains 671 virus-host interactions submitted between 2015 and 2020, providing additional data for host prediction.
dcterms:title: TEST dataset

dcterms:creator: Mária Džunková
Soo Jen Low

dcterms:description: The Single cell tagging dataset identifies 139 pairs of virus-host interactions using single-cell viral tagging, contributing to the understanding of host-phage networks.
dcterms:title: Single cell tagging dataset
